comments.text:
str:
1. open 3 tabs (A,B,C) in one window
2. select tab C
3. drag tab A to detach it to a new window
4. switch back to the original window

actual:
focus is on tab B due to its previous proximity to A

expected:
focus should return to originally focused tab: C
